items.name: Pesarattu Upma
items.description: Pesarattu Upma is a crepe that is made from green lentil and rice which is stuffed with some savoury upma making a wonderful combination to eat.

items.name: Puran Poli
items.description: Puran Poli is a sweet flatbread stuffed with a sweet lentil filling made from hulled and spilt bengal gram/chana dal, jaggery and ground spices.

items.name: Podi Idly
items.description: Podi Idly is made by tossing steamed Idlis in a spicy ground lentil condiment known as Podi.

items.name: South Indian Veg Thali
items.description: South indian veg thali comprises of 3 types of curries, chapathi, rasam, sambar, daal, flavored rice, curd, dessert, pickle, papad

items.name: Gobi 65
items.description: cauliflower florets are batter fried until crisp and tempered with lots of spices, garlic and curry leaves.

items.name: Paneer 65
items.description: Paneer pieces are batter fried until crisp and tempered with lots of spices, garlic and curry leaves.

items.name: Chilli Gobi
items.description: cauliflower kernels fritters tossed and stir-fried with chilli sauce

items.name: Chilli Paneer
items.description: Paneer cubes are tossed and stir-fried with chilli sauce

items.name: Perugu Vada(Dahi Vada)
items.description: Andhra style snack where lentil fritters are soaked in seasoned spiced yogurt.

items.name: Plain Dosa
items.description: Dosa is a popular South Indian thin crepe made with fermented rice and lentil batter.

items.name: Ghee Roast Dosa
items.description: Crisp rice and lentil crepes roasted with Ghee

items.name: Masala Dosa
items.description: crisp rice and lentil crepes stuffed with spiced and savory potato filling.

items.name: Mysore Masala Dosa
items.description: rice and lentil pancake that has a chilli and garlic chutney spread on the inside and stuffed with a potato bhaji and served with coconut chutney.

items.name: Onion Dosa
items.description: Crepe made with fermented rice, lentil batter and topped with chopped onions

items.name: Chocolate Dosa
items.description: Crepe made with fermented rice, lentil batter and topped with chocolate nutella

items.name: Onion Chilli Pesarattu
items.description: Onion Chilli Pesarattu is a thin crepe made with green gram, ginger, cumin & chilies and topped with onion and chillies.

items.name: Schezwan Dosa
items.description: Crepe made with fermented rice, lentil batter and smeared with schezwan sauce

items.name: Schewan Cheese Dosa
items.description: Crepe made with fermented rice, lentil batter and topped cheese and schezwan sauce.

items.name: Schezwan Cheese Masala Dosa
items.description: Crepe made with fermented rice, lentil batter and topped with potato masala, cheese and schezwan sauce.

items.name: 70 MM Dosa
items.description: It’s a family style Dosa more than 3 feet long.

items.name: Railway idly with spicy coconut chutney (3pcs) (Copy)
Pushpa Dosa
items.description: Crispy crepe topped with spreading of Chef special spicy masala paste.

items.name: Gunpowder Dosa
items.description: Rice and lentil crepe topped with spicy powder made from lentils and red chilies.

items.name: Madurai Malli Dosa
items.description: Crispy crepe made from rice and lentil batter, spread with Madurai special coriander chutney, served with savory filling of potato masala .

items.name: Gongura Dosa
items.description: Thin crepe smeared with Gongura leaves chutney(sorrell leaves)

items.name: Ananthpur Karam Dosa
items.description: Rayalseema special Crisp rice and lentil crepes topped with onion red chilly paste.

items.name: Chettinad Dosa
items.description: Crispy crepe made from rice and lentil batter, spread with Chettinaad Masala, cheese, chillies with savory filling of potato masala.

items.name: Paneer Burji Dosa
items.description: Thin crepe topped with spread of Panner burji masala.

items.name: Schezwan Noodles Dosa
items.description: Crepe stuffed with Schezwan noodles.

items.name: DC Special Bahubali Dosa
items.description: Crepe of the size of 100MM with choice of 3 spreads on the dosa.

items.name: Vada (3 pcs)
items.description: A crisp South Indian deep fried fritters made with urad dal. Served with a bowl of hot sambhar and chutney

items.name: Mysore Bonda(3 pcs)
items.description: Mysore Bonda is a tasty, crispy outside & spongy inside snack made by deep frying dollops of urad dal flour batter

items.name: Pongal
items.description: Ven pongal is a traditional South Indian dish made with rice, split yellow mung dal, ghee, cumin, ginger, pepper and curry leaves.

items.name: Podi Idly Thatte Idli
items.description: Thatte Idli is a super soft, fluffy, larger and flatter idli made in plates instead of the regular idli mould

items.name: Karivepaku podi idly
items.description: Mini idly’s tossed in curry leaves spice mix

items.name: Uggani
items.description: Popular Karnataka and Andhra dish made with puffed rice, peanuts, tomatoes, spices and herbs.

items.name: Upma
items.description: Upma is a popular South Indian delicacy cooked by tempering roasted rava(semolina) with onion, spices .

items.name: Poori with Aloo Baaji
items.description: Potato Baaji

items.name: Chapathi with Kurma
items.description: Chapathi is a Flatbread made from wheat flour served with Vegetable Kurma

items.name: Parotta with Veg Kurma
items.description: Parotta is a popular layered flatbread from Southern India. Freshly made Parotta served with Vegetable Kurma

items.name: Veg Kothu Parotta
items.description: Freshly made flaky shredded parotta are cooked in a spicy curry masala.

items.name: Chapathi (1 Piece)
items.description: Chapathi is a Flatbread made from wheat flour.

items.name: Parotta (1 Piece)
items.description: Freshly made Parotta is a popular layered flatbread from Southern India

items.name: Veg Samosa (2 pieces)
items.description: Flaky and crunchy fried samosa are one of the most popular street food snack in Indian cuisine. They feature a pastry-like crust but are filled with savory potatoes and peas for a hearty, delicious snack.

items.name: Onion Samosa (6 pieces)
items.description: Onion Samosa is a crispy fried snack made using spiced onions stuffed in a puff pastry sheet

items.name: Onion Pakoda
items.description: Onion Pakoda is a deep fried Indian snack of crispy and tasty onion fritters made with gram flour (besan), spices and herbs.

items.name: Pav Bhaji
items.description: Popular fast food dish from India consisting of a thick vegetable curry (bhaji) served with a soft bread roll (pav)

items.name: Samosa Chaat
items.description: Crushed Samosa topped with chickpeas or white peas curry (also known as ragda) with dollops of yogurt and chutney along with sev and herbs

items.name: Pani Puri
items.description: Crispy, fried dough balls (puri) stuffed with boiled potatoes or boiled chickpeas or white peas curry (also known as ragda) together with spicy tangy water and a sweet chutney

items.name: Dahi Puri
items.description: Crispy, fried dough balls (puri) stuffed with boiled potatoes or boiled chickpeas or white peas curry (also known as ragda) together with Curd and topped with sev and herbs

items.name: Purnalu (Boorelu) 5 pcs
items.description: 5 Pieces Purnalu (Boorelu) is an Indian sweet and dumpling made of rice flour stuffed with jaggery mixed with dal paste.

items.name: Mango Kesari
items.description: Kesari recipe is a popular and delicious South Indian sweet made from rava (cream of wheat), mango,sugar, ghee (clarified butter), saffron and dry fruits.

items.name: Pineapple Kesari
items.description: Pineapple Kesari recipe is a popular and delicious South Indian sweet made from rava (cream of wheat), pineapple,sugar, ghee (clarified butter), saffron and dry fruits.

items.name: Gulab Jamun
items.description: Fried dough balls made from milk solids and semolina are soaked in a syrup flavored with cardamom, rose water, saffron, and cloves.

items.name: Filter Coffee
items.description: Indian filter coffee is a coffee drink made by mixing frothed and boiled milk with the infusion obtained by percolation brewing of finely ground coffee powder in a traditional Indian filter

items.name: Mini Tiffins
items.description: 1 Idly, 1 Vada, 1 Hot Pongal and 1 Mini Dosa

items.name: Idly, Vada and Single Poori
items.description: 1 Idly, 1 Vada and 1 Poori
